Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1308.jpg'}
{2: '...Why did it end up like this...', 3: '4'}
{3: "It's four in the afternoon. The weather is clear, the sky perfectly blue. White clouds drift overhead, buildings stretch across the distant skyline, and green grass spreads out underfoot..."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Pulao is sitting on your shoulders.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Whoa, Commandant, stop moving around!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl on your shoulders loses her balance and leans back, flailing her arms before gripping your head tightly to steady herself.'}
{2: 'Are you seriously flying a kite while sitting on my shoulders?', 3: '16'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'The instructions say I need to run for ten seconds at a height of at least two meters to send it flying...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Why would any kite need such weird launch conditions?', 3: '19', 4: "So this is a Constellia kite? It's got a lot of character.", 5: '19'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Of course! It\'s the special Double Seventh Festival upgrade by the little mechanoids—"Solar-Powered Impressionist Super Alloy Kite"! And you picked it out for me!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The so-called "Solar-Powered Impressionist Super Alloy Kite" is basically a silver-gray metal plate shaped like a magpie.'}
{3: "It's nearly half Pulao's size and weighs about a third of her body weight... which makes you seriously question whether it can actually fly."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'They say once it takes off, it can fly... one, two, three... anyway, super high! Like really high!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She starts counting on her fingers, though clearly losing track halfway.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "But it needs to start two meters off the ground, and I can't reach that high... good thing I've got you, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Wait, what if I'm too heavy? Can you still run with me up here?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Or maybe we should switch. You hold the kite, and I lift you up by the feet—', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A terrible mental image flashes across your mind—\\na 4\'7" girl holding up a full-grown soldier running with a kite...'}
{2: 'No. This is fine.', 3: '38', 4: 'The power armor can handle the weight.', 5: '38'}
{2: "Besides, isn't the point of flying a kite to do it yourself?", 3: '39'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Hmm... good point. Then let's do it!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She happily hugs your neck with one arm and raises the kite high with the other.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'You run into the wind with the Construct girl riding on your shoulders. The breeze is cool and refreshing, and the little girl above you cheers.'}
{3: 'The silver-gray metal kite catches the wind and rises, spreading hidden wings midair and soaring into the sky under your surprised gaze.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Wow, it's going so high... higher and higher...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You hear the wind rushing past. The kite string is spinning wildly off the spool in her hand... and the weight on your shoulders starts feeling lighter and lighter...'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "It's going higher and higher... Commandant, I'm lifting off the ground!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao, let go of it, now!', 3: '65'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Almost got it, just a little longer. Whoa!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: "A sudden gust hits, and the small body on your shoulders is lifted clean off. She's flying straight toward—"}
{3: '—the towering sky, now gaping open like an abyss, as if ready to swallow her whole...'}
{2: "I'll buy you another one, just let go!", 3: '75'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "No! This one's special!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She clings to the string with all her strength, refusing to let go.'}
{3: 'You reach out and catch her, but the moment you do, your own feet leave the ground...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Commandant, give me your hand!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Just as you're about to slip, the strong little girl grabs hold of you. And just like that, the kite carries both of you higher and higher into the sky..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Under the glow of the setting sun, the "Solar-Powered Impressionist Super Alloy Kite" carries the two of you gently through the sky...', 2: '0', 3: '45', 4: 'ffffffff', 6: '1'}
{3: 'Under the glow of the setting sun, the "Solar-Powered Impressionist Super Alloy Kite" carries the two of you gently through the sky...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1222.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Is this... the windmill tower?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the sun sets and night begins to fall, the kite slowly descends onto the top of a tall tower.'}
{3: "City lights flicker to life below, casting a glow on the girl's flushed cheeks."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Feels like this kite brought us here on purpose. The view of Constellia from up here is amazing...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She seems to have completely forgotten the terrifying ride you just had. She looks around excitedly, then grabs your hand so you can enjoy the night view together.'}
{2: 'That was dangerous, Pulao.', 3: '104'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Yeah... but as long as I'm with you, Commandant, I can survive anything!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gives you a sheepish smile, then confidently pats her chest like a little adult trying to look brave.'}
{2: 'Still, it was too dangerous.', 3: '108'}
{2: "If the kite's lost, I can always buy you another one.", 3: '109'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "But that one's special...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She turns her head away, mumbling under her breath.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Because you picked it for me. It's the souvenir you gave me on the Double Seventh Festival!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She hugs the metal kite tightly. Something you chose without much thought has somehow become a treasure in her eyes...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'It\'s Double Seventh... If I don\'t hold on to this "magpie," how could we ever cross such a long distance to meet?', 4: '1'}
{2: "(Pat Pulao's head)", 3: '121', 4: "But I'm right here with you, aren't I?", 5: '123'}
{3: 'She squints happily, and the tension in her puffed cheeks slowly melts away.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "But there will be times when you're not here with me...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Anyway, I don't want to waste the gift you gave me. And we did manage to catch the kite in the end.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With a bounce in her step, she skips ahead toward the eaves of the windmill tower.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'So... Commandant, come sit here with me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'There are still lots of places in Constellia I want to see with you tonight.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The stars twinkle overhead. She holds the big kite in her arms and swings her legs freely. She leans close to you under the soft glow of the neon lights...'}
{3: 'You stumble together. You laugh together. And together, you share a warm and busy Double Seventh Festival.'}
